attributes.action: Allow all practical students to be able to attend collage for practical lessons
attributes.additional_details: Its almost impossible to do online learning in a practical course. We would like you to allow all practical students to be able to go to collage to do there practical lessons so they don’t fall behind.
attributes.background: Allow all practical students to be able to attend collage for practical lessons. I am a level 2 hairdressing student and I am expected to learn how to cut and colour hair professionally at home using videos. To me this is extremely unhelpful and I need to see an actual person demonstrate this.
